body:
I know that there have been a lot of problems regarding peoples' ranks.
Now I see that EmeraldSword85 doesn't have the "moderator" tag anymore, but has only a donor rank now.
Is this a glitch, or what is happening with peoples' ranks?
body_tagged:
I know that there have been a lot of problems regarding peoples' ranks.
Now I see that EmeraldSword85 doesn't have the "moderator" tag anymore, but has only a donor rank now.
Is this a glitch, or what is happening with peoples' ranks?
title: More Rank Glitching?

replies.body: Idk what's happening around but i believe it's not a glitch and something might have happened to them
replies.body_tagged: Idk what's happening around but i believe it's not a glitch and something might have happened to them

replies.body:
It's not a glitch, EmeraldSword85 was demoted.

However I'm not sure what's happening in regards to the donor ranks.
replies.body_tagged:
It's not a glitch, EmeraldSword85 was demoted.

However I'm not sure what's happening in regards to the donor ranks.

replies.body: I believe people are losing their Donor ranks because of the changes with EULA. However, I am not sure what the problem is with EmeraldSword85 losing his "Moderator" position.
replies.body_tagged: I believe people are losing their Donor ranks because of the changes with EULA. However, I am not sure what the problem is with EmeraldSword85 losing his "Moderator" position.
